messages.title: Tackling the Climate Emergency
messages.content: Climate change and air pollution threaten our future. The climate crisis needs urgent national and local changes to cut transport emissions and support cycling.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Climate change and air pollution threaten our future. The climate crisis needs urgent national and local changes to cut transport emissions and support cycling.
Our citizens play a vital role in public health and education services. We need to fund these services through well planned public investment rather than taxation.
By staying in the EU, we can reduce trade barriers and continue to attract the highly skilled workers our economy needs.

mentions.candidate: Millions of Tories will now vote Lib Dem because of Brexit
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Boris Johnson leads most unpopular new government in 40 years.

issues.brexitEurope: Millions of Tories will now vote Lib Dem because of Brexit. Donald Trump backs Johnson’s Brexit strategy.
